        "lst={};Do[p=Prime[n+0]^0+Prime[n+1]^1+Prime[n+2]^2+Prime[n+3]^3+Prime[n+4]^4; If[PrimeQ[p],AppendTo[lst,p]],{n,6!}];lst",
        "Select[1+#[[1]]+#[[2]]^2+#[[3]]^3+#[[4]]^4&/@Partition[Prime[Range[350]],4,1],PrimeQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 27 2012 *)"
